motivational_quotes: The will to win, the desire to succeed, the urge to reach your full potential. These are the keys that will unlock the door to personal excellence.
Only you can change my life. No one can do it for you.
With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
Sometimes later becomes never. Do it now.
Great things never come from comfort zones.
Success does not just find you. You have to go out and get it.

questions.time_left: I am sorry to hear that. How many hours do you have left before your deadline?
questions.time_needed: How many hours of studying do you think you still need to do to be prepared?
questions.extra_motivation: It seems like you are quite positive today. Do you still need any motivation?

responses.please_repeat: Sorry, I didn't hear you. Can you please repeat that?
responses.repeat_timeout: Sorry, there seems to be a problem. I am shutting down.
